ygData.subject: Re: Magic banded or plate and use of folded metal
ygData.msgSnippet: At present, although my experience is limited, I d guess no and no.  It seems that there are a lot of places where Verant has left themselves room to expand
ygData.messageBody:
At present, although my experience is limited, I'd guess no and no. It
seems that there are a lot of places where Verant has left themselves room
to expand into, and a lot of things that are half-implemented.

Frustrating as it may seem, I think they left some unfinished things in the
game just to make us wonder what the future may hold. We can only hope that
they eventually get through this present phase of spell adjustments and such
and fix the trade skills.
